7 EsdfIntegrator::EsdfIntegrator(const Config& config,
8  Layer<TsdfVoxel>* tsdf_layer,
9  Layer<EsdfVoxel>* esdf_layer)
10  : config_(config), tsdf_layer_(tsdf_layer), esdf_layer_(esdf_layer) {
11  CHECK(tsdf_layer_);
12  CHECK(esdf_layer_);
13 
14  voxels_per_side_ = esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side();
15  voxel_size_ = esdf_layer_->voxel_size();
16 
17  CHECK_EQ(esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side(), tsdf_layer_->voxels_per_side());
18  CHECK_NEAR(esdf_layer_->voxel_size(), tsdf_layer_->voxel_size(), 1e-6);
19 
20  open_.setNumBuckets(config_.num_buckets, config_.max_distance_m);
21 }
22 
23 // Used for planning - allocates sphere around as observed but occupied,
24 // and clears space in a sphere around current position.
25 void EsdfIntegrator::addNewRobotPosition(const Point& position) {
26  timing::Timer clear_timer("esdf/clear_radius");
27 
28  // First set all in inner sphere to free.
29  HierarchicalIndexMap block_voxel_list;
30  timing::Timer sphere_timer("esdf/clear_radius/get_sphere");
31  utils::getAndAllocateSphereAroundPoint(position, config_.clear_sphere_radius,
32  esdf_layer_, &block_voxel_list);
33  sphere_timer.Stop();
34  for (const std::pair<BlockIndex, VoxelIndexList>& kv : block_voxel_list) {
35  // Get block.
36  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr = esdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(kv.first);
37 
38  for (const VoxelIndex& voxel_index : kv.second) {
39  if (!block_ptr->isValidVoxelIndex(voxel_index)) {
40  continue;
41  }
42  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
43  // We can clear unobserved or hallucinated voxels.
44  if (!esdf_voxel.observed || esdf_voxel.hallucinated) {
45  if (esdf_voxel.hallucinated) {
46  GlobalIndex global_index = getGlobalVoxelIndexFromBlockAndVoxelIndex(
47  kv.first, voxel_index, voxels_per_side_);
48  raise_.push(global_index);
49  }
50  esdf_voxel.distance = config_.default_distance_m;
51  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
52  esdf_voxel.hallucinated = true;
53  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
54  updated_blocks_.insert(kv.first);
55  }
56  }
57  }
58 
59  // Second set all remaining unknown to occupied.
60  HierarchicalIndexMap block_voxel_list_occ;
61  timing::Timer outer_sphere_timer("esdf/clear_radius/get_outer_sphere");
62  utils::getAndAllocateSphereAroundPoint(position,
63  config_.occupied_sphere_radius,
64  esdf_layer_, &block_voxel_list_occ);
65  outer_sphere_timer.Stop();
66  for (const std::pair<BlockIndex, VoxelIndexList>& kv : block_voxel_list_occ) {
67  // Get block.
68  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr block_ptr = esdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(kv.first);
69 
70  for (const VoxelIndex& voxel_index : kv.second) {
71  if (!block_ptr->isValidVoxelIndex(voxel_index)) {
72  continue;
73  }
74  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
75  if (!esdf_voxel.observed) {
76  esdf_voxel.distance = -config_.default_distance_m;
77  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
78  esdf_voxel.hallucinated = true;
79  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
80  updated_blocks_.insert(kv.first);
81  } else if (!esdf_voxel.in_queue) {
82  GlobalIndex global_index = getGlobalVoxelIndexFromBlockAndVoxelIndex(
83  kv.first, voxel_index, voxels_per_side_);
84  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
85  }
86  }
87  }
88 
89  VLOG(3) << "Changed " << updated_blocks_.size()
90  << " blocks from unknown to free or occupied near the robot.";
91  clear_timer.Stop();
92 }
93 
94 void EsdfIntegrator::updateFromTsdfLayerBatch() {
95  esdf_layer_->removeAllBlocks();
96  BlockIndexList tsdf_blocks;
97  tsdf_layer_->getAllAllocatedBlocks(&tsdf_blocks);
98  tsdf_blocks.insert(tsdf_blocks.end(), updated_blocks_.begin(),
99  updated_blocks_.end());
100  updated_blocks_.clear();
101  updateFromTsdfBlocks(tsdf_blocks);
102 }
103 
104 void EsdfIntegrator::updateFromTsdfLayer(bool clear_updated_flag) {
105  BlockIndexList tsdf_blocks;
106  tsdf_layer_->getAllUpdatedBlocks(&tsdf_blocks);
107  tsdf_blocks.insert(tsdf_blocks.end(), updated_blocks_.begin(),
108  updated_blocks_.end());
109  updated_blocks_.clear();
110  const bool kIncremental = true;
111  updateFromTsdfBlocks(tsdf_blocks, kIncremental);
112 
113  if (clear_updated_flag) {
114  for (const BlockIndex& block_index : tsdf_blocks) {
115  if (tsdf_layer_->hasBlock(block_index)) {
116  tsdf_layer_->getBlockByIndex(block_index).updated() = false;
117  }
118  }
119  }
120 }
121 
122 void EsdfIntegrator::updateFromTsdfBlocks(const BlockIndexList& tsdf_blocks,
123  bool incremental) {
124  CHECK_EQ(tsdf_layer_->voxels_per_side(), esdf_layer_->voxels_per_side());
125  timing::Timer esdf_timer("esdf");
126 
127  // Go through all blocks in TSDF and copy their values for relevant voxels.
128  size_t num_lower = 0u;
129  size_t num_raise = 0u;
130  size_t num_new = 0u;
131  timing::Timer propagate_timer("esdf/propagate_tsdf");
132  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: Propagating " << tsdf_blocks.size()
133  << " updated blocks from the TSDF.";
134  for (const BlockIndex& block_index : tsdf_blocks) {
135  Block<TsdfVoxel>::ConstPtr tsdf_block =
136  tsdf_layer_->getBlockPtrByIndex(block_index);
137  if (!tsdf_block) {
138  continue;
139  }
140 
141  // Allocate the same block in the ESDF layer.
142  // Block indices are the same across all layers.
143  Block<EsdfVoxel>::Ptr esdf_block =
144  esdf_layer_->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_index);
145  esdf_block->set_updated(true);
146 
147  const size_t num_voxels_per_block = tsdf_block->num_voxels();
148  for (size_t lin_index = 0u; lin_index < num_voxels_per_block; ++lin_index) {
149  const TsdfVoxel& tsdf_voxel =
150  tsdf_block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(lin_index);
151  // If this voxel is unobserved in the original map, skip it.
152  if (tsdf_voxel.weight < config_.min_weight) {
153  if (!incremental && config_.add_occupied_crust) {
154  // Create a little crust of occupied voxels around.
155  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = esdf_block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(lin_index);
156  esdf_voxel.distance = -config_.default_distance_m;
157  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
158  esdf_voxel.hallucinated = true;
159  esdf_voxel.fixed = false;
160  }
161  continue;
162  }
163 
164  EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel = esdf_block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(lin_index);
165  VoxelIndex voxel_index =
166  esdf_block->computeVoxelIndexFromLinearIndex(lin_index);
167  GlobalIndex global_index = getGlobalVoxelIndexFromBlockAndVoxelIndex(
168  block_index, voxel_index, voxels_per_side_);
169 
170  const bool tsdf_fixed = isFixed(tsdf_voxel.distance);
171  // If there was nothing there before:
172  if (!esdf_voxel.observed || esdf_voxel.hallucinated) {
173  if (esdf_voxel.hallucinated) {
174  raise_.push(global_index);
175  }
176  if (tsdf_fixed) {
177  // In fixed band, just add and lock it.
178  esdf_voxel.distance = tsdf_voxel.distance;
179  esdf_voxel.fixed = true;
180  // Also add it to open so it can update the neighbors.
181  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
182  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
183  } else {
184  // Not in the fixed band. Just copy the sign.
185  esdf_voxel.distance =
186  signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) * (config_.default_distance_m);
187  esdf_voxel.fixed = false;
188 
189  if (incremental) {
190  if (updateVoxelFromNeighbors(global_index)) {
191  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
192  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
193  }
194  }
195  }
196  // No matter what, basically, the parent is reset.
197  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
198  num_new++;
199  } else {
200  // If this voxel DID exist before.
201  // There are three main options:
202  // (1) lower: esdf or tsdf is fixed, and tsdf is closer to surface than
203  // it used to be.
204  // (2) raise: esdf or tsdf is fixed, and tsdf is further from surface
205  // than it used to be.
206  // (3) sign flip: tsdf and esdf have different signs, otherwise the
207  // lower and raise rules apply as above.
208  if (tsdf_fixed || esdf_voxel.fixed) {
209  if ((esdf_voxel.distance > 0 &&
210  tsdf_voxel.distance + config_.min_diff_m <
211  esdf_voxel.distance) ||
212  (esdf_voxel.distance <= 0 &&
213  tsdf_voxel.distance - config_.min_diff_m >
214  esdf_voxel.distance)) {
215  // Lower.
216  esdf_voxel.fixed = tsdf_fixed;
217  if (esdf_voxel.fixed) {
218  esdf_voxel.distance = tsdf_voxel.distance;
219  } else {
220  esdf_voxel.distance =
221  signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) * config_.default_distance_m;
222  }
223  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
224  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
225  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
226  num_lower++;
227  } else if ((esdf_voxel.distance > 0 &&
228  tsdf_voxel.distance - config_.min_diff_m >
229  esdf_voxel.distance) ||
230  (esdf_voxel.distance <= 0 &&
231  tsdf_voxel.distance + config_.min_diff_m <
232  esdf_voxel.distance)) {
233  // Raise.
234  esdf_voxel.fixed = tsdf_fixed;
235  if (esdf_voxel.fixed) {
236  esdf_voxel.distance = tsdf_voxel.distance;
237  } else {
238  esdf_voxel.distance =
239  signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) * config_.default_distance_m;
240  }
241  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
242  raise_.push(global_index);
243  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
244  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
245  num_raise++;
246  }
247  } else if (signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) != signum(esdf_voxel.distance)) {
248  // This means ESDF was positive and TSDF is negative.
249  // So lower.
250  if (tsdf_voxel.distance < esdf_voxel.distance) {
251  esdf_voxel.distance =
252  signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) * config_.default_distance_m;
253  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
254  esdf_voxel.in_queue = true;
255  open_.push(global_index, esdf_voxel.distance);
256  num_lower++;
257  } else {
258  // Otherwise ESDF was negative and TSDF is positive.
259  // So raise.
260  esdf_voxel.distance =
261  signum(tsdf_voxel.distance) * config_.default_distance_m;
262  esdf_voxel.parent.setZero();
263  raise_.push(global_index);
264  num_raise++;
265  }
266  }
267  // Otherwise we just don't care. Not fixed voxels that match the right
268  // sign can be whatever value that they want to be.
269  }
270 
271  esdf_voxel.observed = true;
272  esdf_voxel.hallucinated = false;
273  }
274  }
275 
276  propagate_timer.Stop();
277  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: Lower: " << num_lower << " Raise: " << num_raise
278  << " New: " << num_new;
279 
280  timing::Timer raise_timer("esdf/raise_esdf");
281  processRaiseSet();
282  raise_timer.Stop();
283 
284  timing::Timer update_timer("esdf/update_esdf");
285  processOpenSet();
286  update_timer.Stop();
287 
288  esdf_timer.Stop();
289 }
290 
291 // The raise set is always empty in batch operations.
292 void EsdfIntegrator::processRaiseSet() {
293  size_t num_updates = 0u;
294  // For the raise set, get all the neighbors, then:
295  // (1) if the neighbor's parent is the current voxel, add it to the raise
296  // queue.
297  // (2) if the neighbor's parent differs, add it to open (we will have to
298  // update our current distances, of course).
299  GlobalIndexVector neighbors;
300  Neighborhood<>::IndexMatrix neighbor_indices;
301  while (!raise_.empty()) {
302  const GlobalIndex global_index = raise_.front();
303  raise_.pop();
304 
305  EsdfVoxel* voxel = esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(global_index);
306  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
307 
308  // Get the global indices of neighbors.
309  Neighborhood<>::getFromGlobalIndex(global_index, &neighbor_indices);
310 
311  // Go through the neighbors and see if we can update any of them.
312  for (unsigned int idx = 0u; idx < neighbor_indices.cols(); ++idx) {
313  const GlobalIndex& neighbor_index = neighbor_indices.col(idx);
314 
315  EsdfVoxel* neighbor_voxel =
316  esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(neighbor_index);
317  if (neighbor_voxel == nullptr) {
318  continue;
319  }
320  // Don't touch unobserved voxels and can't do anything with fixed
321  // voxels.
322  if (!neighbor_voxel->observed || neighbor_voxel->fixed) {
323  continue;
324  }
325  SignedIndex direction = (neighbor_index - global_index).cast<int>();
326  bool is_neighbors_parent = (neighbor_voxel->parent == -direction);
327  if (config_.full_euclidean_distance) {
328  Point voxel_parent_direction =
329  neighbor_voxel->parent.cast<FloatingPoint>().normalized();
330  voxel_parent_direction = Eigen::round(voxel_parent_direction.array());
331  is_neighbors_parent =
332  (voxel_parent_direction.cast<int>() == -direction);
333  }
334  // This will never update fixed voxels as they are their own parents.
335  if (is_neighbors_parent) {
336  // This is the case where we are the parent of this one, so we
337  // should clear it and raise it.
338  neighbor_voxel->distance =
339  signum(neighbor_voxel->distance) * config_.default_distance_m;
340  neighbor_voxel->parent.setZero();
341  raise_.push(neighbor_index);
342  } else {
343  // If it's not in the queue, then add it to open so it can update
344  // our weights back.
345  if (!neighbor_voxel->in_queue) {
346  open_.push(neighbor_index, neighbor_voxel->distance);
347  neighbor_voxel->in_queue = true;
348  }
349  }
350  }
351  num_updates++;
352  }
353  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: raised " << num_updates << " voxels.";
354 }
355 
356 void EsdfIntegrator::processOpenSet() {
357  size_t num_updates = 0u;
358  size_t num_inside = 0u;
359  size_t num_outside = 0u;
360  size_t num_flipped = 0u;
361  Neighborhood<>::IndexMatrix neighbor_indices;
362 
363  while (!open_.empty()) {
364  GlobalIndex global_index = open_.front();
365  open_.pop();
366 
367  EsdfVoxel* voxel = esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(global_index);
368  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
369  voxel->in_queue = false;
370 
371  // Skip voxels that are unobserved or outside the ranges we care about.
372  if (!voxel->observed || voxel->distance >= config_.max_distance_m ||
373  voxel->distance <= -config_.max_distance_m) {
374  continue;
375  }
376 
377  Neighborhood<>::getFromGlobalIndex(global_index, &neighbor_indices);
378 
379  // Go through the neighbors and see if we can update any of them.
380  for (unsigned int idx = 0u; idx < neighbor_indices.cols(); ++idx) {
381  const GlobalIndex& neighbor_index = neighbor_indices.col(idx);
382  const SignedIndex& direction =
383  NeighborhoodLookupTables::kOffsets.col(idx);
384  FloatingPoint distance =
385  NeighborhoodLookupTables::kDistances[idx] * voxel_size_;
386 
387  EsdfVoxel* neighbor_voxel =
388  esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(neighbor_index);
389  if (neighbor_voxel == nullptr) {
390  continue;
391  }
392 
393  // Don't touch unobserved voxels and can't do anything with fixed
394  // voxels.
395  if (!neighbor_voxel->observed || neighbor_voxel->fixed) {
396  continue;
397  }
398 
399  SignedIndex new_parent = -direction;
400  if (config_.full_euclidean_distance) {
401  // In this case, the new parent is is actually the parent of the
402  // current voxel.
403  // And the distance is... Well, complicated.
404  new_parent = voxel->parent - direction;
405  distance = voxel_size_ * (new_parent.cast<FloatingPoint>().norm() -
406  voxel->parent.cast<FloatingPoint>().norm());
407 
408  if (distance < 0.0) {
409  continue;
410  }
411  }
412 
413  // Both are OUTSIDE the surface.
414  if (voxel->distance > 0 && neighbor_voxel->distance > 0) {
415  if (voxel->distance + distance + config_.min_diff_m <
416  neighbor_voxel->distance) {
417  num_updates++;
418  num_outside++;
419  neighbor_voxel->distance = voxel->distance + distance;
420  // Also update parent.
421  neighbor_voxel->parent = new_parent;
422  // Push into the queue if necessary.
423  if (config_.multi_queue || !neighbor_voxel->in_queue) {
424  open_.push(neighbor_index, neighbor_voxel->distance);
425  neighbor_voxel->in_queue = true;
426  }
427  }
428  // Next case is both INSIDE the surface.
429  } else if (voxel->distance <= 0 && neighbor_voxel->distance <= 0) {
430  if (voxel->distance - distance - config_.min_diff_m >
431  neighbor_voxel->distance) {
432  num_updates++;
433  num_inside++;
434  neighbor_voxel->distance = voxel->distance - distance;
435  // Also update parent.
436  neighbor_voxel->parent = new_parent;
437  // Push into the queue if necessary.
438  if (config_.multi_queue || !neighbor_voxel->in_queue) {
439  open_.push(neighbor_index, neighbor_voxel->distance);
440  neighbor_voxel->in_queue = true;
441  }
442  }
443  // Final case is if the signs are different.
444  } else {
445  const FloatingPoint potential_distance =
446  voxel->distance - signum(voxel->distance) * distance;
447  if (std::abs(potential_distance - neighbor_voxel->distance) >
448  distance) {
449  if (signum(potential_distance) == neighbor_voxel->distance) {
450  num_updates++;
451  num_flipped++;
452  neighbor_voxel->distance = potential_distance;
453  // Also update parent.
454  neighbor_voxel->parent = new_parent;
455  // Push into the queue if necessary.
456  if (config_.multi_queue || !neighbor_voxel->in_queue) {
457  open_.push(neighbor_index, neighbor_voxel->distance);
458  neighbor_voxel->in_queue = true;
459  }
460  } else {
461  num_updates++;
462  num_flipped++;
463  neighbor_voxel->distance =
464  signum(neighbor_voxel->distance) * distance;
465  // Also update parent.
466  neighbor_voxel->parent = new_parent;
467  // Push into the queue if necessary.
468  if (config_.multi_queue || !neighbor_voxel->in_queue) {
469  open_.push(neighbor_index, neighbor_voxel->distance);
470  neighbor_voxel->in_queue = true;
471  }
472  }
473  }
474  }
475  }
476  }
477 
478  VLOG(3) << "[ESDF update]: made " << num_updates
479  << " voxel updates, of which outside: " << num_outside
480  << " inside: " << num_inside << " flipped: " << num_flipped;
481 }
482 
483 bool EsdfIntegrator::updateVoxelFromNeighbors(const GlobalIndex& global_index) {
484  EsdfVoxel* voxel = esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(global_index);
485  CHECK_NOTNULL(voxel);
486  // Get the global indices of neighbors.
487  Neighborhood<>::IndexMatrix neighbor_indices;
488  Neighborhood<>::getFromGlobalIndex(global_index, &neighbor_indices);
489 
490  // Go through the neighbors and see if we can update any of them.
491  for (unsigned int idx = 0u; idx < neighbor_indices.cols(); ++idx) {
492  const GlobalIndex& neighbor_index = neighbor_indices.col(idx);
493  const FloatingPoint distance = Neighborhood<>::kDistances[idx];
494 
495  EsdfVoxel* neighbor_voxel =
496  esdf_layer_->getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(neighbor_index);
497  if (neighbor_voxel == nullptr) {
498  continue;
499  }
500  if (!neighbor_voxel->observed ||
501  neighbor_voxel->distance >= config_.max_distance_m ||
502  neighbor_voxel->distance <= -config_.max_distance_m) {
503  continue;
504  }
505  if (signum(neighbor_voxel->distance) == signum(voxel->distance)) {
506  if (std::abs(neighbor_voxel->distance) < std::abs(voxel->distance)) {
507  voxel->distance =
508  neighbor_voxel->distance + signum(voxel->distance) * distance;
509  voxel->parent = -(neighbor_index - global_index).cast<int>();
510  return true;
511  }
512  }
513  }
514  return false;
515 }
